name: Toss'Em Possum
description:
Download the game for a better experience! Credits

Created by SilviaFox (@samonthepeanut)
Music by Roxy "Good Seats" (@roxybunnny)
Logo by AzuraHardware (@elektricpunk)

Description

Toss'em Possum is a arcade-like 2D platformer where you control Tina Tossum, an evil witch who will stop at nothing for her love. Even if that means destruction of property, terrorizing the innocent and being a general pest to bird-society.

Mix things up a little and bring some instruments to your cauldron to create the ultimate melody! What could possibly go wrong?

Controls

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

D - Jump

S - Pounce

Controller Controls:

What, have you never played a platformer before? C'mon I shouldn't have to tell you which button is JUMP.

I quit this stupid job! I'm never writing a tutorial again!

If you experience any bugs please contact me or post a comment. I can be reached on Twitter at @samonthepeanut, or on Discord at SilviaFox#8568.
